How many people are affected by diastrophic dysplasia ?,"Although the exact incidence of this condition is unknown, researchers estimate that it affects about 1 in 100,000 newborns. Diastrophic dysplasia occurs in all populations but appears to be particularly common in Finland.",GHR,diastrophic dysplasia
